doc.field: Contains printed material of ADS such as annual reports/programs, circulars, pamphlets, mailings, handbooks, booklets, press releases, newsletters, programs, ephemera, ads for publications, and one poster. Topics include WW I (German war crimes, Turkey, peace terms, disease in the army), alien socialism, Russia, Bolshevism, immigration, sedition, communism, the ACLU, labor, 'Americanism.' ADS annual reports include detailed lists of material distributed each year.
Included in this series are copies of the ADS Handbook and "The American Defense Society: History, Purpose and Accomplishments" (both 1918).
Ephemera includes tickets, invites, notices, and programs for ADS meetings and dinners; also advertisements for ADS publications.
Series III. Printed Material, 1915-1942 >> Subseries 1. Printed Material: ADS, 1916-1942
